0.5.5.name: wordpress/nfb-video-plugin
0.5.5.description:
The NFB Video Plugin is designed to allow users to embed videos from sites who provide autodiscoverable oembed links on their film pages.

Previously, to embed a film, we had to provide the entire object or embed the information ourselves; we had to play with the sizes and hope that we didn't break it.

When a site contains autodiscovery, you only need to enter "oe" followed by the pasted link and it will seek out the embed and set it to the size you defined.

Good examples to test it are :

oehttp://www.nfb.ca/film/louise_en/

Set 1 size for all your embeds!
